v1.17.0.description: fixes issue where there was extra spacing after badge and above heading, not enough space after price, and the heading text wraps too early

1.16.0.description: removes 'max-height' from image allowing any desired image size based on design

v1.12.0.description: fixes issue where headings were not being displayed on view port 1

v1.8.0.description: changes image tag display property to inline-block to fix IE alignment issues
